data.name: Pace Chasers
data.detailed_description:
Join the ranks of the Pace Chasers, a league of interdimensional speedsters, as they travel through time and space on a grand tour of races to become the fastest beings in the universe.

Challenge opponents that learn your every move as you seek the fastest path through exciting platformer race tracks.

Race other competitors on Steam Leaderboards in asynchronous multiplayer gameplay.

Choose from 8 playable avatars as you compete against other players on global leaderboards.

In game tools will help players analyze their runs in a quest for time optimized perfection.

Dynamic movement mechanics will have players conserving energy or going nova to get the most from their speed boosting dimensional dash power system.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Chase the pace of other players in asynchronous multiplayer gameplay as you climb the leaderboards in this time trial racing platformer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: intel core 2 duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
